description: Indians cherish winter for the cozy curry enjoyment without the outdoor heat.
title: Curry Winter
n_1: Arjun debates the perfect season for hot curry with Priya.
n_2: Priya explains the charm of winter curry to Arjun.
n_3: They savor the curry indoors, appreciating the warm spices.
c2_3: Told you, winter is for curry.
n_4: Concluding, they enjoy winter's unique pleasure of hot curry.
